alert.note: Alert for Hubbard; Mahnomen; South Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 4:37AM CDT until April 06 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Locally higher snowfall totals possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Mahnomen, South Clearwater and Hubbard Counties. * WHEN...From noon today to 7 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
